mapper.select: /* LoginDao.selectListlogin */ SELECT T.MGR_IDX , T.MGR_ID , T.MGR_NAME , T.PERM_CD , ( SELECT CODE_NAME FROM EZ_CMM_CODE WHERE CODE = T.PERM_CD ) AS PERM_NM , T.DEPT_CD , NVL( ( SELECT CD_SUBJECT FROM EZ_DEPARTMENT A WHERE A.CD_IDX = T.DEPT_CD ), '관리자' ) AS DEPT_NM , ( SELECT CD_IDX FROM EZ_DEPARTMENT WHERE CD_CODE = D.CD_UPR_CODE ) AS P_DEPT_CD , T.ROLE_IDX , R.MGR_SITE_CD , R.PUBLISH_AUTH_YN FROM EZ_MGR_LIST T LEFT JOIN EZ_DEPARTMENT D ON T.DEPT_CD = D.CD_IDX AND D.CD_USE = 'Y' LEFT JOIN EZ_ROLE R ON R.ROLE_IDX = T.ROLE_IDX AND R.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE T.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MGR_USE = 'Y' AND MGR_ID = #{userId} AND MGR_PW = #{passWd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EZ_MGR_USER_LOG ( CU_ID , UL_IDX , IP , REG_DT , LOG_KD_CD , LOGIN_SUC_YN ) VALUES ( #{userId} , (SELECT NVL(MAX(UL_IDX),0)+1 FROM EZ_MGR_USER_LOG) , #{ip} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmddhh24miss') , 'Y' , 'Y' )
